title: No Right to leave the service

tosdr.case: no right to leave the service
tosdr.tldr: Even if you terminate your account, Delicious “may retain an archived copy for legitimate business purposes”. The copyright license does not end.

topics.description: Once you subscribe to the service, will you have the right to leave it and remove your data?
